name: off-balance
description:
Just push the objects around to balance the plane.

  • Keyboard:  wasd or arrow keys to move
  • Game pad: left stick to move

You are a glowy marshmallow trying to create some balance in a sweet but frosty winter world. 

You get ten times the points if you are in the middle of the plane while being in balance.

Created within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49. Theme was "unstable". 

Enjoy :)
